<line: 18> v.
<line: 19> )

[TEXT]
<line: 21> HARTFORD FIRE INSURANCE CO.,
<line: 22> )
<line: 23> et al
<line: 24> )

[TEXT]
<line: 26> Defendant.

[TEXT]

[TEXT]
<line: 29> Pending before the Court are two motions for pro hac vice admission [# 31,
<line: 30> & # 32] filed by D.J. O'Brien III counsel for Defendant Hartford Fire Insurance
<line: 31> Company.

[TEXT]
<line: 33> Upon a review of the motions, it appears that Lee H. Ogburn and William J.
<line: 34> Harrington are both members in good standing with the Maryland Bar and both
<line: 35> will be appearing with D.J. O'Brien III, a member in good standing with the Bar of
<line: 36> this Court. In addition, each attorney has paid the requisite admission fee.

[TEXT]
<line: 38> Accordingly, the Court GRANTS the Motions [# 31, & # 32]. The Court
<line: 39> ADMITS Lee H. Ogburn and William J. Harrington to practice pro hac vice
<line: 40> before the Court while associated with local counsel

[ABANDON]
<line: 42> Signed: October 10, 2017

[ABANDON]
<line: 44> emnest
<line: 45> Dennis L. Howell
<line: 46> United States Magistrate Judge
